attributes.action: Make owners responsible for their dog!!
attributes.additional_details: It’s not fair that dogs should be punished, banned, injured and potentially killed because owners and breeders cannot take responsibility for their irresponsible behaviour. Owners should own full responsibility for their pets.
attributes.background: Instead of banning dogs, make owners fully responsible for their animal. Which if they fail to do so they should be punished not the dog!!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
